description: Generates value-add follow-up sequences with timing and social proof strategy

followup_sequence.message_text: alex, by the way - just came across new data showing teams that streamlined onboarding cut ramp time by 50%. reminded me of your growth plans. want me to share the summary?
alex, worked with another fintech last month dealing with fast hires. they shaved onboarding from 3 weeks to 5 days using automation. curious if you’re tackling anything similar with your new cohort?
alex, no pressure, but i put together a quick one-pager outlining onboarding automations for fast-growing teams like yours. want me to send it over or should i leave you be?

sequence_strategy.reasoning: Starts with relevant data, moves to relatable success, and ends with a targeted asset to maximize openness and value in each step.

social_proof_used: fintech company reduced onboarding from 3 weeks to 5 days
